definition: house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: The gallery was narrow, so narrow that it was barely touched by the burning beams.
sentences.chinese: 樓座很窄，窄到幾乎用燃燒的橫樑都能碰到。

sentences.english: Johann would creep into the gallery to listen to the singers.
sentences.chinese: 約翰會悄悄溜進樓座去聽歌手唱歌。
